WEB3.0 Guard: Phishing Detection & Security for the Decentralized Web

Stay secure in the world of Web3 with WEB3.0 Guard ‚Äì the ultimate browser extension designed to protect you from phishing attacks and fraud.

Introduction: WEB3.0 Guard is a security-focused extension for Chrome, purpose-built for the Web3 ecosystem. It empowers users to safely navigate the decentralized web by detecting phishing websites and verifying token addresses, helping you keep your assets and data secure.

Key Features:
üîí Phishing Detection
WEB3.0 Guard constantly monitors for fraudulent websites and warns you before any potential risk, ensuring a safer browsing experience in the Web3 space.

üè∑Ô∏è Token Address Verification
Easily check token addresses to identify associations with known scams or fraudulent activity, protecting your investments.

üì≤ User-Friendly Interface
Enjoy a sleek, intuitive design inspired by modern Android layouts, complete with modals for alerts, a history log, and smooth navigation for web and mobile Chrome.

üîó Custom API Integration
Leveraging a specialized API for real-time security checks and updates, WEB3.0 Guard keeps your information safe and current.

Stay secure, stay informed. Download WEB3.0 Guard today and explore Web3 with confidence!
